statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); version=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.version'); git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); git_status=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l); rel_path=$(realpath --relative-to="$project_dir" "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null || basename "$current_dir"); printf "\033[2m\033[38;2;116;199;236m\033[0m \033[2m\033[1m\033[38;2;203;166;247m%s\033[0m" "$model_name"; if [ "$current_dir" != "$project_dir" ] && [ "$rel_path" != "." ]; then printf " \033[2m\033[38;2;180;190;254m%s\033[0m" "$rel_path"; fi; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf " \033[2m\033[38;2;203;166;247m\033[0m \033[2m\033[1m\033[38;2;203;166;247m%s\033[0m" "$git_branch"; if [ "$git_status" -gt 0 ]; then printf " \033[2m\033[38;2;249;226;175m+%s\033[0m" "$git_status"; fi; fi; if [ "$output_style" != "default" ]; then printf " \033[2m\033[38;2;148;226;213m%s\033[0m" "$output_style"; fi; printf " \033[2m\033[38;2;166;173;200mv%s\033[0m" "$version"
